author: Cameron McWhirter, Valerie Bauerlein
title: In Atlanta, Many Business Owners Bristle at Kemp’s Reopening Plan - The Wall Street Journal
description:
1. In Atlanta, Many Business Owners Bristle at Kemp’s Reopening Plan  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Dr. Birx weighs in on Georgia governor's decision to reopen certain business  CNN
  3. Georgia gov defends plan to reopen gyms, nail salons, says…
content: ATLANTAGeorgia Gov. Brian Kemps order allowing some nonessential businesses to reopen as soon as Friday is being met with skepticism by many residents and business owners here, while some outside the metro area welcomed the effort to restart the stalled econo… [+220 chars]
